raw_text: WICRAMA SURENDRA NIHAL expired on 28th October 2023. Loving husband of Chitrani Dadigamuwa,​ loving father of Maneesha & Janith,​ father-in-law of Maheka,​ brother-in-law of late Cyril,​ Jayantha,​ Sunil Thebuwana,​ Malini,​ Mallika,​ Sunethra & Indu. Funeral will take place on 31st October 2023 at the Enderamulla Crematorium at 4.00 p.m. No. 31/​3A,​ N.H.S. Kiribathgoda. Tel. 0112918917.069796
